price: (102) They will not hear its sound, while they are, in that which their souls desire, abiding eternally.
arabic: لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ حَسِيسَهَاۖ وَهُمۡ فِي مَا ٱشۡتَهَتۡ أَنفُسُهُمۡ خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: lā yasmaʿūna ḥasīsahā wahum fī mā ish'tahat anfusuhum khālidūna
